name: Wh40k_Armoury_fork
title: Warhammer 40K Astartes Armoury Tweaks and Options
author: TheKingJo
description: This mod tweaks and adds some things to the Warhammer 40K Astartes Armoury mod by MrSilver2510. Right now it is only the option to have the bolters from the start. The rest was implemented in the original mod already.
